mapper.insert: insert into rwd_discuss (dis_num, subject, title, writer, content) values (seq_rwd_discuss.nextval, #{param1.subject}, #{param1.title}, #{param2.email}, #{param1.content})
mapper.select: select * from view_rwd_discuss where dis_num > 0 order by dis_num desc
mapper.update: update rwd_discuss set subject = #{subject}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_date = sysdate where dis_num = #{dis_num}
